title.rendered: Melbourne vs Perth, Australian T20 League 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Melbourne: Martin Guptill, Nic Maddinson (c), Aaron Finch, Shaun Marsh, Jonathan Wells, Peter Handscomb (wk), Akeal Hosein, Will Sutherland, Tom Rogers, Kane Richardson, Mujeeb Ur Rahman

Perth: Faf du Plessis, Adam Lyth, Nick Hobson, Josh Inglis (wk), Aaron Hardie, Ashton Turner (c), Ashton Agar, Jhye Richardson, Andrew Tye, Jason Behrendorff, Peter Hatzoglou

Pitch Report

Venue: Docklands Stadium, Melbourne

(Based on the only game played this season)

1st innings score: 174

2nd innings average score: 175

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Excellent for batting.

Weather: Slightly cloudy

Wins

Batting 1st: —

Batting 2nd: 100 %

Fantasy Tips of the Day

Given the conditions, picking death bowlers is likely to keep the fantasy players ahead in the race. For that matter, Jhye Richardson has taken two three-fors and a four-for in five games. Batters, otherwise, are expected to set the stage on fire.

Both teams boast of top-quality batters in Finch, du Plessis, Guptill, Marsh, Inglis, to name a few. Expect a barrage of boundaries.
